title: 地形加载不了
txt_content:
如题，版本1.12.2，服务端是mohist核心，每次进去都卡在加载地形中
只能删除UUID才能进去
进不去时后台无报错
以下是从客户端的log截取的异常报告


[15:40:18] [Client thread/ERROR] [com.vicmatskiv.weaponlib.tracking.PlayerEntityTracker]: Failed to deserialize trackable entity java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: readerIndex(8) + length(8) exceeds writerIndex(8): UnpooledSlicedByteBuf(ridx: 8, widx: 8, cap: 8/8, unwrapped: PooledUnsafeDirectByteBuf(ridx: 33, widx: 33, cap: 33))
